com.geom.database

Class LongueurDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.geom.database.DAO<java.lang.Double>
      • com.geom.database.LongueurDAO

  • public class LongueurDAO
extends DAO<java.lang.Double>
    This class implements the specific layer to access to the table 'Longueur' That specific table contains the lengths of the different segments of a geometric shape A 'Longueur' belongs to a Figure (geometric shapes). It is defined by :
    • id : the specific key of the length
    • valeur: the value of a length in cm
    • id_figure : the ID of the figure to which the Longueur belongs too
    • num_longueur: a number to order the lengths (1st length, 2nd length,...) because a given figure respect a certain direction
    Author:
    Dasha
